settings.label: Number of sampling points
settings.name: samplingPoints
settings.description: The number of points of the gesture after resampling.

settings.label: Palm threshold
settings.name: palmThreshold
settings.description: The minimum threshold for the hand motion to be considered intentional.

settings.label: Finger threshold
settings.name: fingerThreshold
settings.description: The minimum threshold for the finger motion to be considered intentional.
